alert.note: Alert for Inland Broward County; Inland Miami-Dade County; Metro Broward County; Metropolitan Miami Dade (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 17 at 10:37AM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Miami-Dade and Broward Counties through 1130 AM EDT... At 1037 AM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm near Intersection Krome And U.S. 27, or 9 miles west of Miramar, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Fort Lauderdale, Pembroke Pines, Hollywood, Miramar, Davie, Plantation, Sunrise, Weston, Dania Beach, Cooper City, Royal Palm Ranches, Sunshine Acres, Pine Island Ridge, Intersection Krome And U.S. 27, Broadview Park, Sawgrass Mills Mall, Nova Southeastern University, Intersection I-75 And U.S. 27, Intersection I-75 And Griffin Road and East Toll Gate On Alligator Alley. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes.

area.areaDesc: Inland Broward County; Inland Miami-Dade County; Metro Broward County; Metropolitan Miami Dade
